backend/main.mo: Motoko canister managing user profiles, predefined and custom agencies, and player agency selections with authorization checks.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping game features to source files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend source file.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS base/theme configuration defining light and dark mode OKLCH color variables.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point loading the React app root and main script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component configuring TanStack Router routes and app-wide theming.
frontend/src/components/AppLayout.tsx: Shared layout with navigation, header/footer UI, and authentication button.
frontend/src/components/AudioCaptureOrIm: Provides UI for recording or importing audio, saving it to IndexedDB, and playing back the captured audio.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Renders a login/logout button using Internet Identity, handling authentication flow and query cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/PhotoCaptureOrUp: Allows users to take or upload a profile photo, manages camera usage, and saves the image to IndexedDB with preview support.
frontend/src/components/VideoCaptureOrUp: Handles video recording or uploading, displays previews, and saves the resulting video to IndexedDB.
frontend/src/game/agency/predefinedAgenc: Defines a list of predefined talent agencies with names and descriptions.
frontend/src/game/judging/judgeRules.ts: Generates randomized judge feedback and scores based on performance type, difficulty, and self-rating.
frontend/src/game/judging/types.ts: Declares the JudgeFeedback interface used for structured judge scoring and tips.
frontend/src/game/state/storage.ts: Implements game state persistence in localStorage, including load, save, reset, and lightweight export functions.
frontend/src/game/state/types.ts: Defines types for game state, player profile, submissions, agencies, and judge feedback.
frontend/src/game/state/useGameState.ts: Custom hook managing game state with persistence, including profile, agency, and submission updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity, refetching dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity login/logout handling and exposes identity and status via React context.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Wraps backend actor calls with React Query hooks for profiles, agencies, and agency selection operations.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and custom CSS variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/media/indexedDbMediaStore.t: Implements IndexedDB storage for saving, loading, deleting, and generating URLs for media blobs.
frontend/src/media/useAudioRecorder.ts: Provides audio recording functionality using MediaRecorder, returning recording state and the resulting file/url.
frontend/src/media/useVideoRecorder.ts: Provides video recording via MediaRecorder with preview support and recording state management.
frontend/src/pages/AgencySelectionPage.t: UI for selecting or creating an agency, syncing choices with backend when authenticated.
frontend/src/pages/CareerModePage.tsx: Displays the player's career overview, stats, and next challenge, redirecting to home if required data is missing.
frontend/src/pages/CharacterSetupPage.ts: Provides a form for setting up character details, capturing photo/audio, and saving the profile before moving to the summary page.
frontend/src/pages/HistoryPage.tsx: Shows a sortable list of past performance submissions with metadata and scores, linking to individual result pages.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Renders the game's landing screen with options to start a new game, continue, or reset progress.
frontend/src/pages/NewGameModePage.tsx: Lets the user choose between soloist or survival career paths and begins a new game with the selected mode.
frontend/src/pages/ProfileSummaryPage.ts: Displays the player's profile details and saved media, advancing to agency selection if confirmed.
frontend/src/pages/ResultsFeedbackPage.t: Displays judge feedback for a submitted performance, showing scores, category breakdowns, and judge avatars; redirects if feedback is missing.
frontend/src/pages/SettingsPage.tsx: Shows settings for local data storage, optional cloud sync, and info about fictional judge feedback, with an option to export lightweight progress.
frontend/src/pages/SubmitPerformancePage: Lets the user record or upload a performance, set metadata, generate judge feedback, and save the submission before navigating to results.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utilities for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session-based parameters, including hash-routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, fonts, animations, and plugins for the app’s UI theme.
project_state.json: Describes the project’s current state, goals, features, issues, and required assets for the offline K-pop idol game.
